umontreal.iro.lecuyer.util
Class Num

java.lang.Object
  umontreal.iro.lecuyer.util.Num

public class Num
extends Object

Num

This class provides a few constants and some methods to compute numerical quantities such as factorials, combinations, gamma functions, and so on.
